title: How to Beat Difficult Demons in Geometry Dash

steps.headline: Go into practice mode and go through the level.
steps.description: Take note of the more difficult parts of the level.

steps.headline: Try to find a copy of the level.
steps.description: The creator might have wrote down the password to copy the level in the level's description. Another way is to search the 'copy-able' online.

steps.headline: If you are unable to find get a copy of the level, it is fine.
steps.description: You can still use practice mode on the level.

steps.headline: If you are able to get a copy of the level, go to 'Create' tab and go into the level editor for that Demon.
Once you are in the editor, search for the 'Start Pos'.
steps.description: Place it at the places in the level where you think it is difficult.

steps.headline: Enter normal mode and keep practicing.
steps.description: Practice until you feel confident that you are able to complete that part.

steps.headline: Practice the other parts of the level.
steps.description: Practice 'easy' parts too as they might catch you off guard.

steps.headline: If you're feeling confident that you are able to complete the Demon, try it!
Do not be let down by failures!
steps.description: If you cannot pass a certain part, then go into practice mode or your copy of the level and practice.

steps.headline: Watch other people's gameplay and see how they complete it.
steps.description: Try to compare it with yours. If you notice any difference and you crash there, correct it. Make yourself used to doing it the correct way.

text: Learning the Level Go into practice mode and go through the level. Take note of the more difficult parts of the level. Try to find a copy of the level. The creator might have wrote down the password to copy the level in the level's description. Another way is to search the 'copy-able' online. If you are unable to find get a copy of the level, it is fine. You can still use practice mode on the level. If you are able to get a copy of the level, go to 'Create' tab and go into the level editor for that Demon.  Once you are in the editor, search for the 'Start Pos'. Place it at the places in the level where you think it is difficult. Enter normal mode and keep practicing. Practice until you feel confident that you are able to complete that part. Practice the other parts of the level. Practice 'easy' parts too as they might catch you off guard. Completing the Level If you're feeling confident that you are able to complete the Demon, try it! Let your practice pay off. Do not be let down by failures! If you cannot pass a certain part, then go into practice mode or your copy of the level and practice. Watch other people's gameplay and see how they complete it. Try to compare it with yours. If you notice any difference and you crash there, correct it. Make yourself used to doing it the correct way.
